title: All Cannabis Investors Need Is Just A Little Patience
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Patience, more institutional capital and more catalysts, but mostly we need patience as we wait for the industry to grow into a more mature sector. Matt Hawkins returns to discuss StateHouse/Harborside, the California cannabis market and the developing US landscape. Advice to retail investors and why managing cash is key. Institutional capital will come in and everyone will want in on an MSO or wanting to partner with an MSO. That's where the money is going to be made.
